name: Find The Wrong Copy
description:
There are supposedly four blocks with the same objects. Unfortunately one of them has an error and your task as a QA is to find and remove it.

Gameplay

Click on one block which has the mistake.

Use WASD to rotate the blocks. You can also click on the side of the screen to rotate them.

Background / Game Idea: 

I tried different things, but this is what I ended up with. I also only got reduced time this weekend. I am honestly not 100% happy with it, but I still decided to publish it, hopefully, some people still have fun with it. :)

Known Issues

Two issues I am aware of, but unfortunately did not have time to fix:

  • Sometimes the animals are overlapping which makes them hard to see
  • The rotation is getting a bit off, which is especially challenging towards the higher rounds (but me being a good salesman, I am telling you, this is of course all by design to make it harder, so it is in fact not a bug but a feature :D ;))

Assets used:

  • Graphics:

      • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/quirky-series-animal...
      • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/quirky-series-animal...
    • UI
      • https://craftpix.net/product/jump-game-kit/
  • Music:
